name: Jewel Mystery - Match 3 Game
description:
Jewel Mystery is a match 3 game that collects puzzles and exacerbates emotions.
The old spring in the ancient secret realm is sealed and needs different keys to open. Bill and his search dog are on an adventure to eliminate the keys to collect the keys. Would you help them explore the legend of the old hot spring in jewel mystery?
Match jewels & gems of the same color to eliminate them, complete challenges, help Bill find letters, and unravel the plot!
Reasonable and strategic use of special jewels elimination, stimulate the magical power of gems, and eliminate quickly.
Find hidden obstacles, combine magical props, solve thousands of challenging match-3 levels.
You will be immersed in this twisty plot and exciting world of elimination!

Game Features:
- Unique art style, can be used as the screen of mobile wallpaper.
- Hundreds of well-designed gameplay and mystery match 3 levels.
- The ups and downs of the story are interspersed, collecting shards to redeem rewards.
- Log in to your Facebook account, explore with friends around the world, and save your progress if you change the phone.
- Support EN, JP, GE, KR, PT and other languages, easy to read and easy to use.

Jewel Mystery, match 3 collecting game that can satisfy your curiosity and fantasy of adventure, come and open with your friends!
